00022 #ifndef _LNETCTL_H_
00023 #define _LNETCTL_H_
00024 
00025 #include <lnet/types.h>
00026 
00030 enum {
00031         LNET_CTL_DROP_ADD,
00032         LNET_CTL_DROP_DEL,
00033         LNET_CTL_DROP_RESET,
00034         LNET_CTL_DROP_LIST,
00035         LNET_CTL_DELAY_ADD,
00036         LNET_CTL_DELAY_DEL,
00037         LNET_CTL_DELAY_RESET,
00038         LNET_CTL_DELAY_LIST,
00039 };
00040 
00041 #define LNET_ACK_BIT            (1 << 0)
00042 #define LNET_PUT_BIT            (1 << 1)
00043 #define LNET_GET_BIT            (1 << 2)
00044 #define LNET_REPLY_BIT          (1 << 3)
00045 
00047 struct lnet_fault_attr {
00053         lnet_nid_t                      fa_src;
00055         lnet_nid_t                      fa_dst;
00064         __u64                           fa_ptl_mask;
00072         __u32                           fa_msg_mask;
00073         union {
00075                 struct {
00077                         __u32                   da_rate;
00082                         __u32                   da_interval;
00083                 } drop;
00085                 struct {
00086                         __u32                   la_rate;
00091                         __u32                   la_interval;
00093                         __u32                   la_latency;
00094                 } delay;
00095                 __u64                   space[8];
00096         } u;
00097 
00098 };
00099 
00101 struct lnet_fault_stat {
00103         __u64                           fs_count;
00105         __u64                           fs_put;
00107         __u64                           fs_ack;
00109         __u64                           fs_get;
00111         __u64                           fs_reply;
00112         union {
00113                 struct {
00115                         __u64                   ds_dropped;
00116                 } drop;
00117                 struct {
00119                         __u64                   ls_delayed;
00120                 } delay;
00121                 __u64                   space[8];
00122         } u;
00123 };
00124 
00127 #define LNET_DEV_ID     0
00128 #define LNET_DEV_PATH   "/dev/lnet"
00129 #define LNET_DEV_MAJOR  10
00130 #define LNET_DEV_MINOR  240
00131 
00132 #endif
